name: NecroFarm
description:
NecroFarm is a casual minion defense game that's part farming and part tower defense. Defend your farm from waves of night creatures that come in all directions from the surrounding forest. Use your farming tools to plant and grow crops and then use necromancy to turn them into your unholy minions!

Features:

  • Necromancer-inspired gameplay. Summon and command unholy plant minions.

  • Gain new minions and grow your army size

  • Tactical wave-based survival with an Endless Mode to test your skills.

  • Atmospheric and spooky environment
